name: Tower Dwellers
description: Tower Dwellers is a unit crafting tower defence that features lots of micromanagement and keeps the player engaged in the battle throughout the entire game.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 512MB of video RAM. Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 3 Processor: Dual Core CPU Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 3.0 compliant with 1.0GB of video RAM. Storage: 500 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Obviously 'inspired' by the Kingdom Rush series, but very well produced. I enjoyed playing it, and would recommend it to those who like Tower Defense games.  Pros: Nice animations and art style, voice acting and quirky humor. Contains fresh elements in the tower defense genre, even though it is similar in appearance to Kingdom Rush.  Cons: Some bugs here and there (textual, or support buildings connecting to the wrong towers). Some of the upgrades you can purchase have very little use.
